snippet: A nearly 40-minute commercial by American Express resembles an investigative nonfiction film and reveals the high costs of living outside the traditional financial system.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; nearly 40-minute commercial by American Express is styled and presented as investigative nonfiction film that reveals high costs of living outside traditional financial system; American Express hopes to build coalition for solving problems of people forced to use nontraditional financial services.
lead_paragraph: A nearly 40-minute commercial by American Express resembles an investigative nonfiction film and reveals the high costs of living outside the traditional financial system.

headline.main: A ‘Docu-Ad’ Looks at Hardship of Those Without Bank Access
